desc: Wrap advertising is the marketing practice of completely or partially covering (wrapping) a vehicle in an advertisement or livery, thus turning it into a mobile billboard. This can be achieved by simply painting the vehicle surface, but it is becoming more common today to use large vinyl sheets as decals. These can be removed with relative ease, making it much less expensive to change from one advertisement to another. Vehicles with large, flat surfaces, such as buses and light-rail carriages, are fairly easy to work with, though smaller cars with curved surfaces can also be wrapped in this manner. Wrap advertising is available to anybody irrespective of the vehicle you drive.We are currently seeking to employ individuals in the United States of America
title: Alpha Wrapstyle

desc: Sales Consultant needed.First things first. This is a fixed rate of a zero base pay and with a 20% commission from every sale made. This is to attract only the serious and driven of sales people. Commission base only jobs will yeild a much higher commission rate and depending on your skills, you can earn more money with a 20% commission compared to an hourly base pay plus a low commission (whatever your last job).There is no cap or limitations as to how much you can sell. You will earn 20% from every sale, month over month, for the life of that contract.Example: 	- We offer a monthly service.One client's invoice is $5000 a month. When that client has paid their invoice (clients can be set up for auto withdrawl) you will earn 20% commission from that paid invoice. You will recieve $1000 every month for the life of that contract- for as long as that contract is active.Another client's invoice is $600 a month. When that client has paid their invoice you will earn 20% commission from that paid invoice. You will recieve another $120 every month for the life of that contract. -for as long as that contract is active.A third client's invoice is $3000 a month. When that client has paid their invoice you will earn 20% commission from that paid invoice. You will recieve a third paycheck for $600 every month for the life of that contract. -for as long as that contract is active. and so on...Requirements:Ability to sell Business Continuity. (Knowledge of anything that disrupts the flow of Business needs for small and midsize businesses are a major plus.- just read your daily blogs for info and use dollar face value on an industry of your choosing.)Manages opportunities for client projects. Including working with client to investigate and analyze their needs and requirements; preparing proposals; presenting proposals; answering questions; obtaining acceptance; scheduling service delivery; post-project follow up with the client - to keep them onboard longer than their signed contract.Outstanding consultative selling abilities and excellent interpersonal skills with C-level customers and business partners.Strong presentation skills.Strong oral and written communication skills.
title: Sales Consultant needed.

desc: I want research done about organic olive oil market in certain countries within Europe; UK, Germany, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Netherlands, Belgium and Finland.This research is for a new venture. The venture trades organic olive oil within EU, olive oil is sourced from Cyprus (an EU country) to the countries mentioned above. The venture sources the organic olive oil and is planning to sell directly to customers online  This will be the preliminary research that will lead to further industry and marketing strategy research.Questions:Consumer Market ResearchDescribe the customer persona that buys organic olive oil online and offline seperatelyWhy do people buy organic olive oil? (3 most important ones)What do customers value the most in olive oil?Would they value social impact and the story behind the brand?What values should the brand possess?Target market sizeHow many customers are there in the target market?What is the size of the target market in euros?How big is the online organic olive oil market in size and number of customers?Industry QuestionsWhat are the major trends in the industry?What are the main sales channels?What is the biggest multi-brand online organic market?Which is the best 3 selling organic olive oil websites?
title: Market Research for Organic Olive Oil
